name: Maybe tomorrow
description:
Photosensitive Epilepsy Warning
This game features much flashing lights as well as much patterned lights.

Maybe Tomorrow is a casual game where the player drag the stars with a mouse and brighten up the night sky.
As the player clears each level, the player learns about Andrew and his habit of saying "Maybe tomorrow".
Levels are cleared by reaching certain brightness level.
Constellations can be formed when stars are close to each other and can help make the sky brighter.

Each level features different challenges.
Some levels feature obstacles that block lights from the stars, and some levels have objects that can help the players make the sky brighter.

Choose your own game difficulty
The player can use up to 10 stars per level to clear the level, but players who like challenges can also clear the level by only using certain number of stars per level.

Maybe you are the one that motivates Andrew to say "today".
